about.title: About me
about.subtitle: My introduction
about.description01: Hi ! My name is Auban Labie, a 27-year-old Belgian, junior web developer. I live in Vottem in the province of Liège. My hobbies are obviously programming but also fitness / bodybuilding and video games. Motivated, proactive, always ready to learn. Calm and thoughtful, I try to adapt to all situations. I love bringing both technical and visual aspects to life on digital products. User experience is extremely important to me.
about.description02: Passionate about web development, I had the honor of acquiring several enriching experiences at the IEPSCF Namur Cadets, where I was able to follow an exemplary course and within different establishments such as the unequaled training at BeCode, this which allowed me to amplify my knowledge and my skills related to the job of web developer.
about.description03: My experience as a freelancer taught me to make choices and focus on the priorities of the moment. Each task must be broken down and organized in order to optimize its performance. Just like in a company, the goal of the week via the sprint backlog is a capital understanding within the team to produce the highest added value.

portfolio.name: Portfolio
portfolio.description: My portfolio, designed with Vue.js and enhanced by Three.js, showcases my web development projects and skills. It also provides an insight into my personality and a contact section for those wishing to collaborate.

museum.name: Museum Project
museum.description: The 'Museum project' was a team endeavor during my training at BeCode. A project centered on HTML and CSS, designed to deepen our mastery of these fundamental technologies.

forum.name: Forum bcbb the who
forum.description: During my training at BeCode, I co-created the 'Forum bcbb the who'. An interactive platform primarily developed with HTML, SCSS, PHP, and mySQL, allowing registration, login, and message sending for a complete user experience.

chaos.name: Chaos Coffee Restaurant
chaos.description: During my training at BeCode, the 'Chaos Coffee Restaurant' project challenged our team to build a showcase site for a restaurant using WordPress. Starting with a few images, we crafted a complete and professional website.

leaf.name: Mwenbwa Corses
leaf.description: At BeCode, we developed 'Mwenbwa Corses', an online IDLE game based in Liège. Using HTML, SCSS, and M.E.R.N., the project combines a REST API with a React SPA.

pomodoro.name: React Pomodoro
pomodoro.description: The 'Pomodoro' was crafted during my training at BeCode. Completed solo, this project allowed me to create an efficient Pomodoro timer using the React framework, showcasing my front-end development skills.
